root.name: Town & Country 2: Thrilla's Surfari
root.description: The game is made up of 7 worlds containing about 5 stages each (some worlds contain only 4 stages). The majority of the stages of each world consist of obstacle course levels, where you control Thrilla on a surfboard or skateboard, dodging obstacles and enemies while making your way to the end of the level. As you pass through levels you collect coconuts, which are then used in a "Shell Game" at the end of the level, where the player has an opportunity to win 1ups. At the end of the World, the player fights a Boss enemy, by dodging attacks and throwing exploding Coconuts or other items at the boss to defeat his health.
